title: White Silk Midi Wrap Dress
image_prompt: Isolated flat-lay product render of a white silk midi wrap dress on a plain white background, high-detail fabric texture with subtle sheen, visible stitching, self-tie waist belt, short flutter sleeves, V-neckline, clean hem finish, no model or mannequin.
techpack: White silk midi wrap dress with short flutter sleeves, V-neckline, self-tie waist belt, inner tie fastening, clean hem finish. Fabric: 100% silk, lightweight with natural sheen. Construction: French seams, topstitching along neckline and sleeve edges.
